wikitext.*:
<noinclude>{{month|October}}
Events that occurred on 31 October.
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1855]]''' - [[Joseph Wright]] is born.
* '''[[1914]]''' - The Big Four - [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]], [[Christopher Wiseman|Wiseman]], [[Geoffrey Bache Smith|Smith]] and [[Robert Gilson|Gilson]] - plan to meet at [[Cambridge]], and all but Tolkien come. Now under the lead of [[Thomas Kenneth Barnsley|Barnsley]] and [[Sidney Barrowclough|Barrowclough]], the [[T.C.B.S.]] begins to crumble.
* '''[[1931]]''' - [[Father Christmas]] writes a [[Letters from Father Christmas|letter]] to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s children.
* '''[[1943]]''' - Author [[J.E.A. Tyler]] is born.
* '''[[1948]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 117]].
* '''[[1954]]''' – "[[The Hero Is a Hobbit]]", a review by [[W.H. Auden]] of ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', is published.
* '''[[1961]]''' - Director [[Peter Jackson]] is born in [[wikipedia:Pukerua Bay|Pukerua Bay]], [[New Zealand]].
* '''[[1964]]''' - The fourth episode of the [[Princess]]-serialization of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' is published.
* '''[[1967]] - ''[[The Road Goes Ever On (book)|The Road Goes Ever On]]'' is first published in the United States.'''
* '''[[1970]]''' - Actor [[Nolan North]] is born.
* '''[[1974]]''' - Artist [[Randy Gallegos]] is born.
* '''[[2001]]''' - ''[[Tyalië Tyelelliéva]]'' issue [[Tyalië Tyelelliéva 17|17]] is published.
* '''[[2005]]''' - [[RingCon]] V at [[wikipedia:SeaTac, Washington|SeaTac, Washington]].
* '''[[2010]]''' - Mereth Aderthad XVI, or "EstelCon" of the Spanish Tolkien Society in [[wikipedia:Valencia|Valencia]], [[wikipedia:Spain|Spain]].

==In Arda==
:''Note: Months of the [[Shire Calendar]] only have 30 days, so no events have nor will happen on the 31st.''<noinclude>[[Category:Dates|305]][[fi:31. lokakuuta]]</noinclude>
